content.text:
# Laurence Olivier Award for Best Company Performance

| year        = 2009
| year2       = 2009
| website     =
}}
The Laurence Olivier Award for Best Company Performance was a one-off award presented by the Society of London Theatre in recognition of achievements in professional London theatre. The awards were established as the Society of West End Theatre Awards in 1976, and renamed in 1984 in honour of English actor and director Laurence Olivier.
This award was only presented once, at the 2009 Laurence Olivier Awards.
